turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Baton twirling.
turn.1: What is the most important aspect of Miss Majorette of America?
turn.2: After a twirler has been named Miss Majorette of their state, they will advance to compete for the title of Miss Majorette of America in their division.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Every year, the ESPN Wide World of Sports hosts Twirlmania international championship competition at Walt Disney World.
turn.5: What types of things do they do at Twirlmania?
turn.6: Competition is available for soloists, teams, high schools, colleges, and recreational groups of any age or gender.
turn.7: Do people from all over the world participate?
turn.8: Some countries that have participated in the past include U.S, Japan, Russia, Australia, and England.
turn.9: What do they do besides twirl batons?
turn.10: Competing ranges from baton twirling to pompom and dance.
turn.11: Is it a lot of fun?
turn.12: Competitors also get to march in a Disney parade as well as participate in a fun, family oriented weekend.
